headline: Ask HN: Bing blocking FOSS docs website, how do I find out why?
description:
I found out a few weeks ago that Bing has removed the documentation site for the open source project benthos (https://www.benthos.dev) from search results. I set up their webmaster tools and tried to get answers that way but all I get is a vague "URL cannot appear on Bing" answer, I then opened a support ticket and they still haven't answered after three weeks.

When I open a search (https://www.bing.com/search?q=benthos.dev) at the bottom there is a "Some results have been removed" link that lead me down a rabbit hole. There's a reports hub with some documents regarding site take downs but I can't find anything specific.

I'm not sure what I can do now other than wait and hope the support ticket eventually gets answered. If I could narrow it down to even just a copyright claim versus harmful content maybe I could work out where the problem is.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: Bing屏蔽了FOSS的文档网站，我怎样才能找到原因？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: Bing屏蔽了FOSS的文檔網站，我怎樣才能找到原因？
description_zh-Hans:
几周前，我发现Bing将开源项目benthos的文档网站（https://www.benthos.dev）从搜索结果中删除了。我设置了他们的网站管理员工具，并试图通过这种方式获得答案，但我得到的只是一个模糊的"URL不能出现在Bing上"的答案，然后我开了一张支持票，三周后他们仍然没有回答。

当我打开一个搜索（https://www.bing.com/search?q=benthos.dev）时，底部有一个"一些结果已被删除"的链接，将我带入一个兔子洞。

我不确定我现在能做什么，除了等待和希望支持票最终得到答复。如果我可以把范围缩小到版权要求和有害内容，也许我可以找出问题所在。
description_zh-Hant:
幾周前，我發現Bing將開源項目benthos的文檔網站（https://www.benthos.dev）從搜索結果中刪除了。我設置了他們的網站管理員工具，並試圖通過這種方式獲得答案，但我得到的只是一個模糊的"URL不能出現在Bing上"的答案，然後我開了一張支持票，三週後他們仍然沒有回答。

當我打開一個搜索（https://www.bing.com/search?q=benthos.dev）時，底部有一個"一些結果已被刪除"的鏈接，將我帶入一個兔子洞。

我不確定我現在能做什麼，除了等待和希望支持票最終得到答覆。如果我可以把範圍縮小到版權要求和有害內容，也許我可以找出問題所在。
